Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2015 07:52AM coachdarling wrote: It really is. Your mind can race. I hope I can get in soon but I'm ok and patience is a virtue. Doc said lump is palpable but bot see on on an ultra sound. My breasts are dense and with the HCG they want to move quick. I have stopped estrogen therapy to be on safe side. Gad I am getting referred and this is not being taken to lightly. I had no idea some breast cancer can be HCG positive.Im just staying calm and patient. That is about all you can do until the dx. I keep thinking if that ER doc hadn't did that pregnancy test we wouldn't have known. I praying everybody has a fabulous day. Its sunny and warm here in Virginia and I think I'm gonna take advantage of It. Thank y'all for listening.
Posts.Title: Update on HCG Breast lump coachdarling AlwaysSunny79

Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2015 10:02PM coachdarling wrote: yes all clear. My breast lump is able to be felt but not seen on us. Lymph node is swollen too. I'm being referred to a breast surgeon at wake forest cancer center. I'm feelng hopeful. This Dr has dealt with HCG positive breast tumors.I'm in good hands
Posts.Title: Update on HCG Breast lump coachdarling AlwaysSunny79

Posts.Content: Apr 6, 2015 09:40PM coachdarling wrote: Melissa thank you for responding. I'm just freaked I'm actually having morning sickness all signs pregnancy. It crazy all signs of pregnancy and no baby. I do want to say that I am sorry that y'all have had to go through the cancer battle. I just have a bad feeling.
Posts.Title: Hcg positive with a breast lump worried coachdarling coachdarling

Posts.Content: Apr 6, 2015 09:36PM coachdarling wrote: Oh thanks so much for your reply. I found another lump and some swelling so doc is concerned and referring me to a breast surgeon. I did not know that about the HCG. Its nice to know I am not alone.Thank you for responding. I'm actual still having morning sickness. This sucks and my energy is like slowly going. I have 2boys and married. I have always been a go go person but noticed in the last 6 months I have been tired. I'm glad my doc is on top of it.
